name: Ben & Jerry's Non-Dairy, Cherry Garcia, 16 oz
short_description: Ben & Jerry's Cherry Garcia Non-Dairy pint
Cherry ice cream with cherries & fudge flakes
All of Ben & Jerry?s ice cream is made with non-GMO sourced ingredients
Includes Fairtrade certified cocoa, sugar, and vanilla
Certified Vegan
product_description: Ben & Jerry's Cherry Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert certified vegan and gluten free pint with cherries & fudge flakes. We've kicked our Non-Dairy flavors up a notch with an OAT-standing new recipe. Prepare for this creamy, legendary, OAT of this world concoction. This flavor is our tribute to guitarist Jerry Garcia fans everywhere, and it all started with a piece of fan mail. You see, back in the day, before smartphones and social media, our fans spoke to us via handwritten notes pinned to the bulletin boards at our Scoop Shops. Sometime in 1986, one such fan mailed a postcard to our main office in Burlington, Vermont. Ben & Jerry's meets great guitar solos? We loved the idea, and Ben immediately began creating the iconic concoction. Cherry Garcia debuted in 1987 and quickly became one of our top three most popular flavors. But just as every good musician has to evolve, Ben & Jerry's does, too. So in answer to queries from all of those air-guitar heroes who can’t or choose not to eat dairy, we decided it was time to create this fan favorite into a vegan dessert. It’s made with smooth and creamy OAT milk, which is the perfect blank canvas for the cherries and fudge flakes we pack into this pint. Same euphoria, minus the dairy—and here’s hoping it inspires at least a few soulful guitar riffs. Like all of our flavors, Cherry Garcia non-dairy is a gmo free and uses Fairtrade certified cocoa and vanilla. If that’s not enough, we went one step further to gain 100% vegan and gluten free diet certification. All the flavor is wrapped in responsibly sourced packaging, so you can feel good about what’s in your freezer.

name: Talenti Gelato For a Delicious Frozen Dessert Madagascan Vanilla Bean Made with Ingredients 1 pint
short_description: Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is slow cooked, creamy vanilla gelato with Madagascan vanilla beans and a hint of lemon zest for a unique Talenti twist.
We add a hint of lemon zest to our Madagascan Vanilla Bean gelato for a one-of-a-kind taste that's anything but plain vanilla.
Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean gelato is a gluten-free frozen dessert.
All Talenti Gelato flavors are OU-D Kosher Certified and are crafted with non-GMO ingredients.
Talenti does not use high fructose corn syrup in any of our frozen dessert products.
Starting Jan 1, 2020, Talenti Gelato and Sorbetto Jars have been made with 100% Recycled Plastic
product_description: If you’re looking for delicious, you’ve found the perfect frozen dessert. Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is our unique take on the classic vanilla ice cream flavor. Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is slow cooked, creamy vanilla gelato with Madagascan vanilla beans and a hint of lemon zest for a unique Talenti twist. The result is a one-of-a-kind taste that's anything but plain vanilla. At Talenti, we believe the best process and ingredients result in delicious gelato and sorbetto. There are no shortcuts when it comes to crafting the most delicious gelatos and sorbettos. That’s why we source the highest-quality ingredients from all around the world. Then, we package our products in clear, BPA-free jars that can be recycled and reused any way you like. Please note that Talenti jars are not microwave or dishwasher safe. (For clever reuse ideas, check out #Pintcycling on Instagram). In addition to Talenti Gelato, Talenti has Dairy-Free Sorbettos, Organic Gelato and Gelato Layers -- 5 layers of the ultimate indulgence. All our products are made with non-GMO sourced ingredients which have been evaluated by Where Food Comes From, Inc., and adhere to our Non-GMO Sourced Standards.

name: Ben & Jerry's, Frozen, Ice Cream Non Dairy Tonight Dough, 16 Ounce
short_description: No hydrogenated fats or high fructose corn syrup allowed in any food
No bleached or bromated flour
No synthetic nitrates or nitrites
product_description: Ben & Jerry's Caramel & Chocolate non-dairy frozen dessert and certified vegan pint with chocolate cookie swirls, gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough. Inspired by the show and host that we love staying up late for, this 100% certified vegan version of the dairy original is sure to leave you with a Fallon-sized smile. Dig in to Ben & Jerry’s The Tonight Dough Non-Dairy while you watch The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon — or whenever you’re craving cookie dough because this pint is chock-full. Fans of the original pint are flipping their lids that our Flavor Gurus have churned up a certified vegan version made with oat milk. Full of all the caramel, chocolate, cookies, and cookie dough you love, The Tonight Dough Non-Dairy is the perfect accompaniment to Jimmy Fallon’s hilarious antics. Whether he’s interviewing this week’s hot personality or reading tweets from his fans, he keeps us laughing from our first scoop to our last. Even sweeter? Proceeds from Ben & Jerry’s The Tonight Dough Non-Dairy go to SeriousFun Children's Network, a global organization that provides summer camp experiences for children with serious illnesses. Ben & Jerry’s non-dairy is part of a certified vegan diet and is made with non-GMO sourced ingredients, including Fairtrade Certified sugar, cocoa, and vanilla. It comes in responsibly sourced packaging, for a frozen dessert, you can feel good about.

short_description: A CREAMY DELIGHT: Enjoy our unsweetened vanilla coconutmilk yogurt alternative on its own or with your favorite toppings, from granola to diced fruits
GREAT FOR DAIRY-FREE LIFESTYLES: Our plant-based yogurt alternative is dairy-, lactose-, soy-, and gluten-free
MADE WITH ORGANIC COCONUTMILK as part of our commitment to high-quality ingredients
AVAILABLE IN SO MANY BELOVED FLAVORS, including strawberry banana, raspberry, key lime, and more
VEGAN AND NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED; no artificial flavors, hydrogenated oils, added MSG, or trans-fats
product_description: A wondrous wave of creamy goodness awaits in every spoonful of So Delicious Dairy Free Unsweetened Vanilla Coconutmilk Yogurt Alternative. Close your eyes and treat yourself to a moment of bliss as the silky tide of coconutmilk mingles with the smooth trickle of unsweetened vanilla. And if you’re feeling adventurous, try sprinkling in a pinch of granola or your favorite diced fruits. We make this luscious yogurt alternative with organic coconuts and no dairy, lactose, soy, or gluten, so you can relish in the joys of yogurt like never before. Has dairy free ever tasted so delicious?

name: Talenti Gelato for a Delicious Frozen Treat Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip Gluten Free 1 pint
short_description: Enjoy the delicious flavor of Talenti Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip Gelato
Sweet and tart black raspberry frozen gelato with decadent chocolatey chips
In this Talenti Gelato frozen treat we use Black Raspberries (not regular raspberries) grown from a family farm in the Pacific Northwest
Talenti Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip Gelato is a Gluten Free and OUD Kosher frozen dairy dessert
We only use Non-GMO sourced ingredients in our Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip Gelato
Every Talenti Gelato and Sorbetto Jar is made with 100 percent recycled plastic
product_description: Our creamy Black Raspberry Chocolate Chip Gelato combines black raspberries from a father-daughter run raspberry farm in Oregon with rich chocolatey chips, blending together the best of both tart and sweet in one frozen treat of chocolate chips and raspberry gelato. If you love the flavor combination of chocolate and fruit, you won't be able to resist this frozen snack. At Talenti, we believe the best process and highest quality ingredients results in the best tasting gelato, sorbetto and frozen desserts. We start with fresh milk and cream and make each flavor from scratch with the highest-quality ingredients sourced from all around the world. With every recipe, Talenti adds a twist to make each pint extra special. Finally, we use an old-world process that involves slow cooking our ingredients in small batches to bring out delicious flavors for a one-of-a-kind frozen dessert. Our sorbetto and gelato flavors are creamy, smooth and indulgent desserts, perfect for any occasion. Our gelato is packaged in clear BPA-Free plastic jars so when you've finished your pint, you can reuse your jar or recycle (rinse and replace the lid first)! In addition to our classic Gelato flavors, Talenti has Gelato Layers frozen dairy desserts, Dairy Free Sorbettos, USDA Certified Organic Gelato and flavors that are Gluten Free and/or vegan. All of our flavors are made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients. Try all of our flavors and discover why Talenti is Crafted for Taste, Clearly Talenti. Please note: Talenti jars are not microwave or dishwasher safe All ingredients in Talenti have been evaluated by Where Food Comes From, to our Non-GMO policy.

name: Talenti Dairy-Free Sorbetto for Your Next Indulgence, Summer Strawberry with Real Strawberries in Each Jar, 1 pint
short_description: Sprinkle sweetness into your day with Talenti Summer Strawberry Sorbetto, made with real strawberries in every jar. Take a bite of summer with this delightful non-dairy frozen dessert.
This frozen dessert is made with only the highest quality ingredients and juiciest hand harvested strawberries from Zamora, Mexico, blended with a dash of lemon to create a unique Talenti twist.
Grab a pint of our Summer Strawberry flavor with real strawberries in each spoonful! Italian inspired, this sorbet makes a smooth and refreshing frozen dessert any time of year.
Talenti Sorbetto is the perfect non-dairy treat when you’re craving something light and refreshing like sherbert or a popsicle, but nothing as creamy or indulgent as ice cream or gelato.
This jar of Summer Strawberry sorbetto is certified Kosher and made with non-GMO ingredients, blended with real strawberries for an explosion of ruby red sweetness.
For you, all Talenti sorbetto are gluten-free, non-GMO project certified, and kosher. And for the planet, all our frozen dessert jars are reusable.
product_description: Crafted for taste and made with strawberries hand harvested in Zamora, a region in Mexico renowned for its strawberry production, Talenti Summer Strawberry Sorbetto is the perfect blend of high-quality ingredients for the sweetest summery treat any time of year. Each spoonful is bursting with the naturally sweet flavor of bright red strawberries, making a simple and guilt-free ice cream alternative. Certified Kosher, made with non-GMO ingredients and blended with real strawberries for an explosion of ruby red sweetness, our Summer Strawberry sorbetto will be a welcome dessert in your freezer. At Talenti, we believe that only the best process and ingredients result in delicious gelato and sorbetto. That's why we source the highest-quality ingredients from all around the world. Then, we package our products in clear, BPA-free jars that can be recycled and reused any way you like. Please do note that Talenti frozen desserts jars are not microwave- or dishwasher-safe. For clever reuse ideas, check out #Pintcycling on Instagram. In addition to Talenti Gelato, Talenti has Dairy-Free Sorbettos, Organic Gelato flavors and Gelato Layers—5 layers of the ultimate indulgence. All our products are made with non-GMO sourced ingredients which have been evaluated by Where Food Comes From, Inc., and adhere to our Non-GMO Sourced Standards.
